wifi: mt76: mt7921e: fix random fw download fail

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.6 by commit e4c2e8f738488d83ebb81a9788b5e3b7f9806ccf, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit bf3747ae2e25dda6a9e6c464a717c66118c588c8. For more details please see the references link.
